text: Hello everyone, when switching a Template (Blog-index) – am replacing an “Drag and Drop”-Template to HTML+HubL Template with dnd_areas – the prepared sections are not addable & the list of modules does still display the old ones of the Template (and not the New ones within the Theme-Template). Do I have to set sth. else in Settings? (e.g. set the Theme to use)
Also real good performance when loading… :disappointed:
